headline: Jim Cramer Breaks Down the Selloff in Align Technology Stock
summary: Align Technology, Inc. (NASDAQ:ALGN) is one of the stocks that Jim Cramer spoke about. Cramer highlighted that the company “missed its numbers badly.” He remarked: “What do you make of the shocking decline in a company like Align Technology? That’s the maker of Invisalign clear aligners. It’s the gold standard, the one that dentists love […]

headline: Align Technology Announces $200 Million Open Market Repurchase
summary: TEMPE, Ariz., August 05, 2025--Align Technology, Inc. ("Align") (Nasdaq: ALGN) a leading global medical device company that designs, manufactures, and sells the Invisalign® System of clear aligners, iTero™ intraoral scanners, and exocad™ CAD/CAM software for digital orthodontics and restorative dentistry, today announced that it is planning to repurchase $200 million of Align’s common stock through open market repurchases under Align’s $1.0 billion stock repurchase program that was approved by A

content.title: Align Technology Announces $200 Million Open Market Repurchase
content.summary: TEMPE, Ariz., August 05, 2025--Align Technology, Inc. ("Align") (Nasdaq: ALGN) a leading global medical device company that designs, manufactures, and sells the Invisalign® System of clear aligners, iTero™ intraoral scanners, and exocad™ CAD/CAM software for digital orthodontics and restorative dentistry, today announced that it is planning to repurchase $200 million of Align’s common stock through open market repurchases under Align’s $1.0 billion stock repurchase program that was approved by A
